title: Twisted Fate Challenge Bug
body:
The challenge requires 3 wins so you can get the icon.Here's the thing,I have won at least 5 games but i'm still sitting at 2/3 won games.
Fix this rito!

replies.body:
there's a notification in the client about it.
or there was at least.
Reading is something that people seem not to do before they post shit on boards.
why trawl through 1000s of trolls ? what a waste of time

Except for the fact that most of the shit posted on boards in since the patch is clones of other posts.

There was someone that counted 15 Hud update ones.

But for this topic in particular, there is a similar thread with Graves quest, and one about match history that has riot posts explaining what is going on.
Then put a link to it and move on instead of bitching about people bitching.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PhRA8KE0,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-25T03:19:28.250+0000)
> There was someone that counted 15 Hud update ones.

 hey that's me
Touche, seems most of your posts are echos of others espousing the wonders of the latest patch.

Yes because i'm not a 12vie bitch that handles change about as much as being told to clean my room.

Fact is league changes every 2 weeks, you don't have to like it, you just have to accept it or leave.

Simple.
Well, I could agree with you, but then we'd both be wrong.
